chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

n: nat
l: pos n
h: pos n
a: pos n
s: pos n
Hsa: s <> a
Hsh: s <> h
Hsl: s <> l
Hah: a <> h
Hal: a <> l
Hhl: h <> l

spec: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Vector.t (list bool) n -> Prop
f: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Vector.t (list bool) n
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
v <> f v

Premises:

full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> forall (p q i k : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) v, v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_decoder_ko_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) v, v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
decoder = fun (c h l : pos n) (q : nat) => let decoder_error := PUSH c Zero :: POP c q q :: nil in fix decoder (s i : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) {struct lt} : list (bsm_instr n) := match lt with | nil => decoder_error | (th, tl) :: lt0 => POP c (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) q :: tile h l th tl ++ PUSH c Zero :: POP c s s :: decoder s (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) lt0 end : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments decoder _ _ _ (_ _ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
main_loop_ok_spec : forall v (ln : list nat), v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> v#>a = nil -> v#>s = list_nat_bool ln -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh = ll) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, main_loop) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall x : pos n, x <> a -> x <> h -> x <> l -> v#>x = w#>x)
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
full_dec_spec_rec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) v, v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[lc/c][(hh ++ v#>h)/h][(ll ++ v#>l)/l])
tiles_solvable = fun lt : list (list bool * list bool) => exists ln : list nat, ln <> nil /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh = ll) : list (list bool * list bool) -> Prop Arguments tiles_solvable _%list_scope
